sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词均含有"因为"之意。
means: as ：从属连词，语意较because, since弱，着重在主句，所表示的原因或理由是"附带的"。
because ：从属连词，语意强，着重直接的原因或理由，所引出的从句是全句的重心，用以回答why提出的问题。
for ：并列连词，语气较弱，所引出的句子一般放在后面，表示附带说明的理由或推断理由。
since ：语意比because弱，但比as强，一般用于表示"由于大家已知的事实"。

sentence.Network_en: Since the birds interbreed they cannot be classed as different species.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于这些鸟进行杂交繁殖，不能把它们归为不同的物种。

sentence.Network_en: I've had the hots for him ever since he came to college.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从他来上大学后，我就对他春心萌动。

sentence.Network_en: "Prices are down 40 per cent since Christmas," he lamented.
sentence.Network_cn: “圣诞节以来物价降了4成，”他悲叹道。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: contraction of obsolete sithence, or from dialect sin (both from dialect sithen 'thereupon, afterwards, ever since')

encyclopedia.content: 单词拼读 单词：since 英音：[sins] 美音：[sɪns] 词典解释副词 ad. 锛埑Ｓ糜谙衷谕瓿墒被蚬ネ瓿墒憋級 1.此后；从那时到现在 She left school three years ago and has worked as a nurse ever since. 她三年前毕业，从那时起便一直当护士。 2.之前，以前介词 prep. 1.锛埑Ｓ糜谙衷谕瓿墒被蚬ネ瓿墒憋級自。..以来，从。..至今 I haven't heard from him sincelast year. 我自去年以来未曾收到过他的信。 连接词 co

entry.tran: (表示某情况自过去某时间点或某个事件以来一直持续到现在)自…以后，从…以来
entry.def: You use since when you are mentioning a time or event in the past and indicating that a situation has continued from then until now.

example.ex: Jacques Arnold has been a member of parliament since 1987...
example.tran: 雅克·阿诺德自 1987 年以来一直是议会议员。

example.ex: She had a sort of breakdown some years ago, and since then she has been very shy...
example.tran: 几年前她得了神经衰弱，自那以后就变得十分腼腆。

entry.tran: (表示某事件或情况从过去某时间或某个事件之后一直发生)自…以来,在…之后
entry.def: You use since to mention a time or event in the past when you are describing an event or situation that has happened after that time.

example.ex: The percentage increase in reported crime in England and Wales this year is the highest since the war...
example.tran: 今年英格兰和威尔士报道的犯罪增长率是战后以来最高的。

example.ex: He turned out to have more battles with the Congress than any president since Andrew Johnson.
example.tran: 结果他是自安德鲁·约翰逊以来和国会斗争最多的一任总统。

entry.tran: (表示过去某事或某情况发生后不久又发生了另一件事)此后，后来
entry.def: When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time.

example.ex: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released...
example.tran: 约 6,000 人被捕，后来其中的几百人又被释放了。

example.ex: His style of leadership has attracted increasing criticism among his supporters, many of whom have since left Central Office.
example.tran: 他的领导风格已经在他的拥趸中引起了越来越多的批评，很多人后来离开了总局。

entry.def: If you say that something has long since happened, you mean that it happened a long time ago.

example.ex: Even though her parents have long since died, she still talks about them in the present tense.
example.tran: 尽管双亲早已离世，她谈论起他们时好像他们至今健在。

entry.def: You use since to introduce reasons or explanations.

example.ex: I'm forever on a diet, since I put on weight easily...
example.tran: 我永远都在减肥，因为我很容易长胖。

example.ex: Since she did not make enough money to live in her own house, she went back to live with her mother.
example.tran: 她挣的钱不够自己一个人住，于是搬回去和她妈妈一起住了。

auth_sentence.content: Other nations including the Bahamas have since followed suit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other nations including the Bahamas have since followed suit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other nations including the Bahamas have since followed suit.

auth_sentence.content: Since January it's been the number one issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since January it's been the number one issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since January it's been the number one issue.

auth_sentence.content: Since its launch Twitter has obviously seen rapid growth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since its launch Twitter has obviously seen rapid growth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since its launch Twitter has obviously seen rapid growth.

means.word_mean: (表示时间)从…以来; 自从…之后

sentences.en: I have lived here since January.
sentences.cn: 自一月份以来, 我一直住在这里。

sentences.en: He had seen her only once since the meeting.
sentences.cn: 自从那次会议以来, 他只见过她一次。

sentences.en: He's been working in a bank since leaving school.
sentences.cn: 自从毕业后, 他就一直在一家银行工作。

sentences.en: I have not seen him since then.
sentences.cn: 从那以后我再也没见过他。

means.word_mean: 从过去某时间以来[以后, 到现在]

sentences.en: He disappeared many years since.
sentences.cn: 他多年以前就不知去向。

sentences.en: Her husband died 10 years ago but she has since remarried.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫于十年前去世, 但她后来又嫁人了。

sentences.en: I've long since forgotten what our quarrel was about.
sentences.cn: 我早就忘掉我们为什么吵架了。

sentences.en: It was not long since that I returned.
sentences.cn: 我是在不久前回来的。

sentences.en: He came to London 3 years ago and has lived here ever since.
sentences.cn: 他三年前来到伦敦, 此后就一直住在这里。

means.word_mean: 自从(过去某事)以来[以后, 到现在]

sentences.en: Since I left college, I have not seen him.
sentences.cn: 自从我离开大学以后, 就没有见过他了。

sentences.en: They have never been to see me since I was ill.
sentences.cn: 自从我生病之后, 他们一直没来看过我。

sentences.en: Since I have owned a bicycle, I have gone to school by it every day.
sentences.cn: 自从我有了一辆自行车后, 我每天骑车上学。

sentences.en: I have known him ever since I was a child.
sentences.cn: 我自孩提时代起就已经认识他了。

sentences.en: It is ten years since she left me.
sentences.cn: 自从她离开我已经十年了。

sentences.en: It is five years since he left here.
sentences.cn: 他离开这儿已有五年了。

sentences.en: It is three years since I have seen him.
sentences.cn: 我已经三年没见到他了。

sentences.en: It was four months since we had been here.
sentences.cn: 我们已经有四个月没来这了。

sentences.en: His health is much improved since he gave up smoking.
sentences.cn: 他自戒烟以来, 健康状况大大改善了。

sentences.en: I met him last week.Since we left school, we had often written to each other.
sentences.cn: 上周我遇见了他。自从我们离开学校后, 我们曾经常互相写信。

sentences.en: The man has been drinking beer ever since the party started.
sentences.cn: 晚会开始以来, 那个男人就一个劲儿地喝啤酒。

sentences.en: She has been collecting stamps since she was a child.
sentences.cn: 她从小起就一直在集邮。

means.word_mean: 因为; 既然; 由于

sentences.en: Since it is late I shall go home now.
sentences.cn: 由于时间晚了, 我现在要回家了。

sentences.en: Since you are so sure of it he'll believe you.
sentences.cn: 既然你对此这么有把握, 他会相信你的。

jushi.english: He had seen her only once since the meeting.
jushi.chinese: 自从那次会议以来,他只见过她一次。

jushi.english: I have lived here since January.
jushi.chinese: 自一月份以来,我一直住在这里。

jushi.english: I have not seen him since then.
jushi.chinese: 从那以后我再也没见过他。
